data.name: ViewAndManageCollections
data.value: View and manage collections of the application

data.name: ConfirmDeleteVersion
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this version? All associated files will be removed.

data.name: Build wisdom one verse at a time
data.value: Build wisdom one verse at a time

data.name: Remind yourself...
data.value: Remind yourself to take a break from your task and read a bit of scripture with Minute Verse!

data.name: Lots of customization options...
data.value: Lots of customization options. Scroll down for more information, or click the button below to download the latest version. Available for free.

data.name: Receive regular notifications...
data.value: Receive regular notifications about your favourite verses. Various customization options available.

data.name: Create and edit your own...
data.value: Create and edit your own collections directly from the application.

data.name: Export your created collections...
data.value: Export your created collections or import collections created by other people.

data.name: Do you work on your PC or laptop?
data.value: Do you work on your PC or laptop?

data.name: Then Minute Verse is for you...
data.value: Then Minute Verse is for you. A simple application that acts as a reminder to take a break from work and take a short dive in the wisdom of the Bible.

data.name: Here are some ways you can use the app:
data.value: Here are some ways you can use the app:

data.name: As a reminder...
data.value: As a reminder to take a break from your work

data.name: Learning little by little...
data.value: Learning little by little verses from the Bible

data.name: A tool to help you memorize...
data.value: A tool to help you memorize some of your favourite verses using repetition throughout the day

data.name: Create your own collection...
data.value: Create your own collection of verses or favourite quotes you want to remind yourself of

data.name: Easy to install and use as is...
data.value: Easy to install and use as is. Currently available for Windows 10 and 11.

data.name: See below all of the features of the application
data.value: See below all of the features of the application

data.name: You can customize the intervals...
data.value: You can customize the intervals when the notifications should appear and for how much time they should stay on screen.

data.name: Scroll to the next or previous verses...
data.value: Scroll to the next or previous verses in the same book quickly from the notification window

data.name: Make the notification window...
data.value: Make the notification window more or less transparent depending on your preferences

data.name: Choose from a variety of pre-set color...
data.value: Choose from a variety of pre-set colors to customize your notification window.

data.name: Click the chapter and verse to open a simplified reader...
data.value: Click the chapter and verse to open a simplified virtual book if you want to get more context for the verse.

data.name: If you prefer, the notification window...
data.value: If you prefer, the notification window can be pinned on the desktop on top of other applications.

data.name: Create and edit your own collections using the integrated editor...
data.value: Create and edit your own collections using the integrated editor. You can add new translations, with books and chapters or create simplified collections of your favourite verses.

data.name: You can select your favourite chapters or books...
data.value: You can select your favourite chapters or books or collections from which you want notifications.

data.name: Share your private collections...
data.value: Share your private collections with other people directly from the application. You can import or export any custom collections as files.

data.name: Try it out and see if you like it...
data.value: Try it out and see if you like it. Run the installer once it's downloaded to install the application. Run through the welcome setup and you're good to go!

data.name: Keep this Book of the Law always...
data.value: Keep this Book of the Law always on your lips; meditate on it day and night, so that you may be careful to do everything written in it. Then you will be prosperous and successful.

data.name: At Minuteverse.eu, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.
data.value: At Minuteverse.eu, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.

data.name: We do not collect or request any personal or identifiable information from our users.
data.value: We do not collect or request any personal or identifiable information from our users.

data.name: The only information we collect is your IP address, which is used solely to count unique visitors to the website. This information is not used to identify you personally and is not linked to any other data.
data.value: The only information we collect is your IP address, which is used solely to count unique visitors to the website. This information is not used to identify you personally and is not linked to any other data.

data.name: The IP address is used exclusively for statistical purposes to determine the number of unique visitors. We do not use this information for marketing, profiling, or sharing with third parties, except as required by law.
data.value: The IP address is used exclusively for statistical purposes to determine the number of unique visitors. We do not use this information for marketing, profiling, or sharing with third parties, except as required by law.

data.name: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the limited data we collect.
data.value: We take appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the limited data we collect.

data.name: As no personal data is collected, there are no personal records to access, modify, or delete. If you have any concerns, you may contact us at:
data.value: As no personal data is collected, there are no personal records to access, modify, or delete. If you have any concerns, you may contact us at:

data.name: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.
data.value: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated date.
